segments.text: Professor , I am going to need to leave class early today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to go to the airport to pick up a relative .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you planning on having someone take notes for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I've got that part covered .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When , exactly do you need to leave ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't need to leave until the very end of class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , but next time try and not have to miss class again .
segments.speaker: S2
